name: pandora-marketplace
description: Pandora Marketplace - Collection of Claude Code plugins, agents, commands, and skills

plugins.name: context-engineering
plugins.title: Context Engineering
plugins.description: Comprehensive context engineering toolkit with commands for analyzing codebase architecture, tech stack, coding guidelines, and generating project glossaries.

plugins.name: deepwiki
plugins.title: DeepWiki - Intelligent Documentation Generator
plugins.description: Comprehensive documentation generation system for codebases. Analyzes your codebase structure and generates evidence-backed, well-organized markdown documentation with ASCII diagrams and automatic cross-references.

plugins.name: launchdarkly
plugins.title: LaunchDarkly Integration
plugins.description: Integration with LaunchDarkly feature flag management system for managing feature flags directly from Claude Code.

plugins.name: context-manager
plugins.title: Context Manager
plugins.description: Manage team context distribution and initialization. Provides commands for teams to pull, initialize, and update context templates from the marketplace into their projects.
